001package imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang;
002
003import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
004
005public enum CalibrationImage implements ImageResource {
006        CalibImageStack("CalibImageStack.tif"),
007        CalibIm1,
008        CalibIm2,
009        CalibIm3,
010        CalibIm4,
011        CalibIm5,
012        marked1,
013        marked2,
014        marked3,
015        marked4,
016        marked5;
017
018        private final static String BASEDIR = "DATA";
019        private final String filename;
020
021        CalibrationImage() {
022                this(null);
023        }
024
025        CalibrationImage(String filename) {
026                this.filename = filename;
027        }
028
029        @Override
030        public String getFileName() {
031                return (this.filename != null) ? this.filename : this.autoName();
032        }
033        
034        @Override
035        public String getRelativeDirectory() {
036                return BASEDIR;
037        }
038
039
040        String getAbsolutePath() {
041                return this.getClass().getResource("") + "/" + getRelativeDirectory() + "/" + getFileName();
042        }
043
044}
